title: Impeachment Inquiry Casts Spotlight on Spy Chief Joseph Maguire
text:
As Democratic House Speaker Nancy Pelosi announced an impeachment inquiry into President Trump, she looked into the camera and delivered a sharp ultimatum to Joseph Maguire, the acting director of national intelligence.

Mr. Maguire must turn over the full whistleblower complaint that has plunged Washington into the most serious political standoff of Mr. Trump’s presidency, Mrs. Pelosi said, and he has until his scheduled Thursday appearance before the House Intelligence Committee to do so.

...
description: Joseph Maguire, the acting director of national intelligence, finds himself in an uncomfortable position after House Speaker Nancy Pelosi announced an impeachment inquiry and said he must turn over the whistleblower complaint.
